summary: Diff implements branding/logo plumbing and a reusable admin MediaPicker, adds admin branding page and routes, updates TopNav to use backend branding logo with fallback, and extends history/about/home editors to include MediaPicker with backend model/migration changes. Two likely gaps: (1) fallback logo still hardcodes a specific filename, and (2) public rendering of video media is not evidenced and HistoryPage currently renders media only as an .

missing_requirements.requirement: Fix the site-wide header logo so the same correct logo is shown consistently on all pages by removing any hardcoded/incorrect logo filename usage and using a single canonical logo source throughout the frontend; fallback to existing generated logo asset when no configured logo exists.
missing_requirements.reason: While TopNav now uses a shared getLogoUrl() helper, the fallback in branding config is still a hardcoded, specific logo filename/path. This appears to violate the requirement to remove hardcoded/incorrect logo filename usage and to fall back to the existing generated logo asset.

missing_requirements.requirement: Public pages that render the edited content display the saved images/videos appropriately (read-only) for History, About, and Home content.
missing_requirements.reason: HistoryPage renders attached media using an tag only; there is no evidence of conditional rendering for video (e.g.,
